name: places/ChIJrRoyqaNZwokRQwQq6BQ4fS0
adrFormatAddress: 144 5th Ave, New York, NY 10011-4317, USA

originalText.text: David was my 3rd attempt to get a custom jumpsuit made for a performance. I brought him cheap pants and a jacket and hoped for the best as I was told by others it’s a difficult piece to make. He called me weeks before my deadline to tell me it’s finished. When I came in I was absolutely blown away. I didn’t think what he did was even possible with my budget and the quality of the already existing pieces. Saying he nailed it was an understatement. He made a perfect replica down to the last button. He was such a pleasure to work with, great at communicating and so sweet. Can’t wait to go to him for my next project.

He made a perfect replica down to the last button. He was such a pleasure to work with, great at communicating and so sweet. Can’t wait to go to him for my next project.

originalText.text: David made several custom leather pieces for me when I was Mr Eagle NYC 2003: An NYPD Hwy cop uniform, leafher Levi's and the coolest leather belted shorts I've ever seen. All of Davids leathers were my favorites. The fit and workmanship were perfect.  Sadly, out here in CA, people have stolen me blind,  in fact just about everything. So I'm here today to order another pair of those shorts!
